name: Jungle Survivor
description:
It happens just like in the movies. It happened with your helicopter to crash in the Amazon forest.

Have you ever thought of finding yourself in such situations? If not, the most important thing is to remember that there is always a solution. Your mission is to survive in the jungle in this simulation-survival game. You will have to create your own home, hunt for food, make friends from the local villages to somehow try to send a rescue SOS message.The important thing is that you survived. And now everything is in your hands.

Try to remember what you saw in movies, books because in such extreme situations any idea can be useful. Watch out!

Game Features:
- 10 levels
- Animal hunting (wolves, deer)
- RPG character
